help-file.title: SKILL_MERCENARY
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all skills available to the Mercenary class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h flaying, 1h piercing, 1h slashing, 2h bludgeon, 2h flaying, 2h slashing, backstab, bandage, capture, carve, climb, dodge, double attack, dual wield, first aid, fishing, headbutt, hide, kick, mine, mount, parry, rescue, riposte, shield block, swim, switch opponents, track, unarmed damage 20th level: tackle, appraise 30th level: reach weapons 51st level: switch opponents, throat crush 56th level: double headbutt, triple attack
Mercenary Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Brigand, Bounty Hunter
